verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-MNR: officially] [V: announced] [ARG1: tariffs on more than $ 50 billion worth of Chinese goods] [ARGM-TMP: on Friday] and threatened to implement more if the Chinese government retaliates with tariffs of their own .

[ARG0: President Donald Trump] officially announced tariffs on more than $ 50 billion worth of Chinese goods on Friday and [V: threatened] [ARG1: to implement more if the Chinese government retaliates with tariffs of their own] .

[ARG0: President Donald Trump] officially announced tariffs on more than $ 50 billion worth of Chinese goods on Friday and threatened to [V: implement] [ARG1: more] [ARGM-ADV: if the Chinese government retaliates with tariffs of their own] .

President Donald Trump officially announced tariffs on more than $ 50 billion worth of Chinese goods on Friday and threatened to implement more if [ARG0: the Chinese government] [V: retaliates] [ARG1: with tariffs of their own] .
